data.caption: Notice Of First Meeting Of Committee Of Creditors (Coc) Scheduled To Be Held On Tuesday, 6Th June, 2023.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (LODR) and in accordance with the requirements of sub-clause 16(g) of Clause A of Part A of Schedule III of LODR, we wish to inform you that first meeting of Committee of Creditors (CoC) of Future Lifestyle Fashions Limited (under CIRP) will be held on Tuesday, 6th June, 2023.

data.caption: Public Announcements - Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process (CIRP).
data.news_body: Public Announcements - Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process (CIRP).

data.caption: Admission Of The Insolvency Petition Filed By The Financial Creditor - Copy Of Order Of Hon'Ble NCLT
data.news_body: With reference to the above, please find enclosed herewith the copy of Order of the Hon'ble National Company Law Tribunal ('NCLT') pronounced and uploaded on the NCLT web portal today i.e. 04 May 2023, regarding admission of the petition of Bank of India, filed under Section 7 of the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code, 2016 (the Code) before the Hon'ble NCLT on 26 August 2022 against the Future Lifestyle Fashions Limited.

data.caption: Regulations 30 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And DisclosureRequirements) Regulations, 2015 ('SEBI Regulations') - Admission Of The Insolvency Petition Filed By The Financial Creditor
data.news_body: With reference to the above, please be informed that the Hon'ble National Company LawTribunal ('NCLT') has pronounced its Order today i.e. 04 May 2023, allowing theadmission of the petition of Bank of India, filed under Section 7 of the Insolvency andBankruptcy Code, 2016 (the Code) on 26 August 2022 against the Future LifestyleFashions Limited, on alleged amount of default of Rs.495.91 crore.The Hon'ble NCLT while pronouncing the Order, has also approved the appointment ofMr. Ravi Sethia as an Interim Resolution Professional ('IRP') in terms of section 16 of theCode.Kindly take the same on record and acknowledge the receipt.

data.caption: Updates On Other Matters Under The Insolvency And Bankruptcy Code, 2016
data.news_body: Future Lifestyle Fashions Limited has informed the Exchange regarding - Updates on the matters filed under the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code, 2016 against the Company before the Hon'ble National Company Law Tribunal''.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Managing Director
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Part A of Schedule III of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that, Mr. Vishnuprasad M has tendered his resignation as Managing Director and as a Director of the Company with effect from the closure of working hours of 16 February 2023.Consequent to the said resignation, Mr. Vishnuprasad M has ceased to be the Managing Director and Director of the Company and he also ceased to be ''Key Managerial Personnel'' and member of Committee of Directors of the Company with effect from the closure of working hours of 16 February 2023.Kindly take the above information on your records.

data.caption: Updates On Other Matters Under The Insolvency And Bankruptcy Code, 2016
data.news_body: Updates on other matters under the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code, 2016.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Chief Financial Officer (CFO)
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of Schedule III of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that, Mr. Dharmesh Jain - Chief Financial Officer of the Company has resigned with effect from the closure of working hours of 03 February 2023 due to personal reasons. Consequent to the said resignation, Mr. Dharmesh Jain has ceased to be the Chief Financial Officer and ''Key Managerial Personnel'' (KMP) of the Company and member of Risk Management Committee of the Company with effect from the closure of working hours of 03 February 2023.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body: We write to inform you that Mr. Rahul Mehta, has resigned from the position of the Chairperson and Independent Director of the Company with effect from 30 January 2023. He also ceased to be member of the Audit Committee, Stakeholders Relationship Committee, Nomination & Remuneration Committee, Corporate Social Responsibility and Environment Social and Governance (CSR & ESG) Committee and Committee of Directors of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body: We write to inform you that Ms. Neelam Chhiber, has resigned from the position of IndependentDirector of the Company with effect from 30 January 2023. She also ceased to be member ofthe Audit Committee, Stakeholders Relationship Committee, Risk Management Committee,Corporate Social Responsibility and Environment Social and Governance (CSR & ESG)Committee, and Nomination & Remuneration Committee of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Registered Office Address
data.news_body: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company vide its circular resolution dated 05 January 2023 has approved the shifting of the Registered Office of the Company from Knowledge House, Shyam Nagar, Off. Jogeshwari Vikhroli Link Raod, Jogeshwari (East), Mumbai 400060 to 1st Floor, Future Group Office, SOBO Brand Factory, Pandit Madan Mohan Malviya Marg, Cross Road Haji Ali, Tardeo, Mumbai - 400 034 with effect from 05 January 2023, within the local limits of city of Mumbai.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Scrutinizer''s Report
data.news_body: This is to inform that the 10th Annual General Meeting of the Company was held on Saturday, 31 December 2022 at 2:00 pm through Video Conference (VC) / Other Audio-Visual Means ('AGM') to transact the business as set out in the Notice of the AGM. In this regard, we enclosed herewith the following:   1. The details of the combined voting results (Remote e-voting prior to AGM and e-voting during the AGM), as required under Regulation 44 of the Listing Regulations - Annexure I;2. Report of Scrutiniser dated 02 January 2023 on Remote e-voting prior to AGM and e-voting during the AGM - Annexure II.The above reports are also being uploaded on the Company's website and also on the website of National Securities Depository Limited - www.evoting.nsdl.com.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Outcome of AGM
data.news_body: This is to inform that the 10th Annual General Meeting of the Company was held on Saturday, 31 December 2022 at 2:00 pm through Video Conference (VC) / Other Audio-Visual Means ('AGM') to transact the business as set out in the Notice of the AGM. In this regard, we enclosed herewith the following:   1. The details of the combined voting results (Remote e-voting prior to AGM and e-voting during the AGM), as required under Regulation 44 of the Listing Regulations - Annexure I;2. Report of Scrutiniser dated 02 January 2023 on Remote e-voting prior to AGM and e-voting during the AGM - Annexure II.The above reports are also being uploaded on the Company's website and also on the website of National Securities Depository Limited - www.evoting.nsdl.com.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: In pursuance of provisions of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015, as amended, and in accordance with the code of conduct for regulating, monitoring and reporting of trading by designated persons as adopted by the Company, please note that the trading window for dealing in securities of the Company shall be closed effective from the closure of the Quarter ending on 31 December 2022 and shall remain closed till 48 hours after the announcement of un-audited financial results of the Company for the quarter ending on 31 December 2022.

data.news_body: Future Lifestyle Fashions Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 30/12/2022 ,inter alia, to consider and approve To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2022 and other business matters.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30 And 47 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. -Newspaper Advertisements For Notice Of Annual General Meeting (Including Remote E-Voting).
data.news_body: Please find enclosed herewith the copies of newspaper advertisements published in the newspapers viz. Free Press Journal (in English) and Navshakti (in Marathi) intimating that: 1. Tenth (10th) Annual General Meeting of the Company (AGM) will be held on Saturday, 31 December 2022 at 2:00 pm (IST) through Video Conferencing / Other Audio-Visual Means.  2. Remote e-voting facility offered to its Members at the AGM.The above information is also available on the website of the Company www.futurelifestyle.in

data.caption: Tenth (10Th) Annual General Meeting Of The Company (AGM) Will Be Held On Saturday, 31 December 2022 At 2:00 Pm (IST) Through Video Conferencing / Other Audio-Visual Means.
data.news_body: This is to inform that the Tenth (10th) Annual General Meeting of the Company (AGM) will be held on Saturday, 31 December 2022 at 2:00 pm (IST) through Video Conferencing / Other Audio-Visual Means.We enclose herewith the Notice convening the said AGM alongwith Annual Report of the Company for the financial year 2021-22.

data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report.
data.news_body: This is to inform that the Tenth (10th) Annual General Meeting of the Company (AGM) will be held on Saturday, 31 December 2022 at 2:00 pm (IST) through Video Conferencing / Other Audio-Visual Means.We enclose herewith the Notice convening the said AGM alongwith Annual Report of the Company for the financial year 2021-22.

data.caption: Updates On Other Matters Under The Insolvency And Bankruptcy Code, 2016 (The 'Code')
data.news_body: Please note that the Hon'ble National Company Law Tribunal ('NCLT') has pronounced an Order today, whereby the application filed by the Catalyst Trusteeship Limited (Applicant/ Petitioner) under section 7 of the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code, 2016 against the Company, is dismissed by the NCLT.Kindly take the same on record and acknowledge the receipt.

data.caption: Notice Of Postponement Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: With reference to our earlier communication dated 8 November 2022, this is to inform you that due to unavoidable circumstances, the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company scheduled to be held today, i.e. Monday, 14 November 2022, inter-alia, to consider and approve the un-audited financial results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and half year ended 30 September 2022, is postponed.The next date of the Board Meeting would be intimated in due course of time.Further, in terms of the Company's Code of Conduct for Regulating, Monitoring and Reporting of Trading by Designated Persons, the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company has been closed from 01 October 2022 and shall continue till 48 hours after the announcement of un-audited financial results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended on 30 September 2022.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulations 30 And 51(2) Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 [SEBI (LODR)] - Default In Payment Of Interest Due On Non-Convertible Debentures - Series IV (Ncds/ Debentures)
data.news_body: The Company is unable to service its obligations in respect of annual interest on the Non-Convertible Debentures - Series IV (NCDs/ Debentures), due and payable on 09 November 2022.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting Under Regulation 29(1)(A) Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.
data.news_body: Future Lifestyle Fashions Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 14/11/2022 ,inter alia, to consider and approve This is to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Monday, 14 November 2022, inter-alia:1. to consider and approve the un-audited standalone financial results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended 30 September 2022;2. to consider and approve the un-audited consolidated financial results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended 30 September 2022.Further, in terms of the Company's Code of Conduct for Regulating, Monitoring and Reporting of Trading by Designated Persons, the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company has been closed from 01 October 2022 and would remain closed till 16 November 2022 (both days inclusive), for the purpose of declaration of the above financial results of the Company.
